channel.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
channel.description: If moparisthebest believed in freedom like a real American then he would let us.

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

make a post pruner that has a checkbox for what section to prune the posts from

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

I think he should be able to have his account deleted, he has contributed to the moparisthebest site but he asks for this now, I don’t see why not, its his account and I think his right to be able to. Let him do* it MITB.

ALSO: He already can edit his posts to nonsense, so I don’t see why you can’t let him to it the easy way.

edit: do

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’m not thinking of anything specific, but it is more the content of the posts. I don’t use any names I have used here anywhere else and never have done, nor email addresses.

Like I said, I don’t have any specific worries based on anything I have said here or whatever. It just seems odd that you would allow us to destroy the valuable public posts anyway (editing), yet wouldn’t allow us to do it conveniently.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

if you really needed to be ‘un-linked’ from your posts here, couldn’t i just change your name/email?

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I dunno, just would be nice to be able to. I don’t have any strong reasons, but it’d be nice to have the ability to be forgotten. Information you post on here could link you to things you don’t want to be linked to. You give us the ability to edit and delete our own public posts already, which can remove valuable posts just as easily, this would just be one button to do it all.

  • shrugs

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?

item.title: Why can't I delete my account & all of its posts?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:

Why would you want to? I don’t like losing valuable posts.
